issues.description: The UML in the problem statement declares getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor() with return type int, but the template's TODO comment and the solution implementation use a double return type for this method. This mismatch can confuse students about the expected signature and return type and may cause tests or example code to disagree with the UML diagram.
issues.suggested_fix: Make the return type consistent across artifacts. Preferably update the problem statement (UML diagram and any textual mentions) to specify getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor(): double to match the template comment and the solution implementation (double), and ensure tests expect a double. Alternatively, if an integer result is desired pedagogically, change the template comment and the solution method signature/implementation to return int and update any related documentation/tests accordingly.
